subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coach Isiah Thomas said that the Knicks’ inconsistency was a result of their youth. After easy victories against Seattle and Philadelphia, the Knicks were routed Friday by Charlotte, one of the league’s worst teams.
snippet: Coach Isiah Thomas said that the Knicks’ inconsistency was a result of their youth. After easy victories against Seattle and Philadelphia, the Knicks were routed Friday by Charlotte, one of the league’s worst teams.
